original_text: But the land you are crossing the Jordan to take possession of is a land of mountains and valleys that drinks rain from heaven.
korean_text: 너희가 건너가서 차지할 땅은 산과 골짜기가 있어서 하늘에서 내리는 비를 흡수하는 땅이요

sentences.original_text: But the land you are crossing the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신이 요단을 건너는 그 땅은

sentences.original_text: is a land of mountains and valleys
